wiki.content:
Writen & Produced by Benny Andersson & Björn Ulvaeus. This was the title track for ABBA's 1980 LP-Album of the same name. A "Super Trouper" is a type of directional spotlights used to follow a performer on stage, hence the lyric "Tonight the Super Trouper lights are gonna find me, Shining like the sun". It was released as single (with "The Piper" as the b-side) and charted in the Top 10 in several countries.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Writen & Produced by Benny Andersson & Björn Ulvaeus. This was the title track for ABBA's 1980 LP-Album of the same name. A "Super Trouper" is a type of directional spotlights used to follow a performer on stage, hence the lyric "Tonight the Super Trouper lights are gonna find me, Shining like the sun". It was released as single (with "The Piper" as the b-side) and charted in the Top 10 in several countries.

track.name: Super Trouper
comments: Never do I tire of ABBA .. This was a great era when they was the top notch . and proves to be still a favorite sound  at any music event ..  Long live ABBA .
I remember it knocking off Blondie's "The tide is high" back in November of 1980.I think it came straight in at number 1.There wasn't room for two brilliant singers wanting to be number 1.
Gorgeous song from the most beatiful voices and sexy angels that have ever come out of Sverige.

SUUUUUPER ABBA 
ABBA - leider nicht mehr gegenwärtig!!!
ABBA ich kann nicht genug davon bekommen!
Genius song and a truly impeccable vocal. But then again, I can say the same thing about nearly everything they did.
<3 this is an incredibly beautiful song, and definitely one of my favorites. I love Abba.
